description:
It’s friend vs. friend as Marik mind controls Jonouchi to duel against Yugi!  The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!  Can Yugi break Jonouchi out of his spell, or will Jonouchi break Yugi?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hijou no Duel: Yuugi vs Jounouchi
非情の決闘[デュエル] 遊戯VS城ノ内
